modName: I Have Made Sandals The Norm Deal With It
summary:
Ever wanted to wear sandals in Skyrim?
Requires Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/19134]SSE VERSION[/url]

This simple mod adds 2 sandals in the game, [b]common sandals[/b] (clone of the Moth Priest sandals from the Dawnguard Expansion) and [b]fine sandals[/b] (clone of the wedding sandals). In addition, this mod provides a male mesh for the wedding/fine sandals, fixes that odd tan on the male common/moth priest sandals and makes both the common and fine sandals buyable from Radiant Raiment in Solitude.

Requires Dawnguard for the Moth Priest/Common Sandals.

Thanks to Bethesda Game Studios for the original meshes.
author: Butane Boss aka BlueHatteddunmer
